Squidward: A self important mollusk, who exudes independence and disdain for silliness but inwardly desires the comaraderie and joy from friendships with more childish members of the community.
Spongebob: A childlike sponge who loves life, always looks toward the bright side despite obstacles, and seeks to include everyone as a friend.
Patrick: A goofy but goodhearted starfish who makes up with heart what he lacks in intelligence. Spongebob's best friend.
